flounder.fonts

Class FontType

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.fonts.FontType

  • public class FontType
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a font type that can be used in any text.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FontType

        public FontType(MyFile textureAtlas,
                MyFile fontFile)
        Creates a new font type.
        Parameters:
        textureAtlas - The image that holds the signed distance values.
        fontFile - The file that describes how to renderObjects the font, file usually ends in '.fnt'.
